div.div: at Alliance, Ohio | Mount Union Stadium

tr.td: Wesley wins toss. Defers to second half. Mount defends south endzone.
Jon Storck kickoff 54 yards to the MTU11, Jonathan Gonell return 22 yards to the MTU33, out-of-bounds (Dyamond Ruffin).
B.J. Mitchell rush for 67 yards to the WES0, 1ST DOWN MTU, TOUCHDOWN, clock 14:41.
